name: Oppaidius Orange Cat Kart Trouble: The Visual Novel
name_original: Oppaidius Orange Cat Kart Trouble: The Visual Novel
description:
Have you ever wondered what it would be like to be a dedicated Oppaidius Fan and then take part in the glorious Garfield Kart racing competition?

Me neither.

But this Visual Novel is as close as you'll get to the experience, so you might as well give it a go.

(Director's Commentary: This was secretly worked on at the time of the original competition and was going to be released to give non-gamers a chance to participate in the race [the Visual Novel awards you a final time in the race circuit]. But.. software crashed, the director ran out of time and the release date of April 1, 2021 passed by. Now, two years after the joke, the punchline is finally ready. Was it worth the wait? No, and you're welcome).
